subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Racewalking
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Mocked and misunderstood by outsiders, and largely an afterthought even in the world of track and field, racewalking is a serious pursuit in many parts of Latin America.
snippet: Mocked and misunderstood by outsiders, and largely an afterthought even in the world of track and field, racewalking is a serious pursuit in many parts of Latin America.
